forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain during the afternoon. High 6C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of light rain this afternoon. High 42F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain . Low 38F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 43F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow. High 4C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers in the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow in the afternoon. High 39F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 80%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of snow. Low -2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 70%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow. Low around 30F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 70%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Sunday
